description: Snack Smile is a hostess pub/bar that caters to male customers primarily. http://anidb.net/ch1169 [Shimura Tae] works here as a hostess (or bouncer, depending on circumstances) together with http://anidb.net/ch16983 [Oryou], Ane (阿音) and http://anidb.net/ch16985 [Hanako]. http://anidb.net/ch1660 [Matsudaira Katakuriko] is a frequent VIP customer here, and even brought the Shogun here once.
name: Snack Smile
